headline: Sensormatic Solutions Enables Enhanced Retail Traffic Analytics with Re-ID Technology and Advanced Deep Learning AI Capabilities
summary: NEUHAUSEN, Switzerland, July 08, 2025--Sensormatic Solutions, the leading global retail solutions portfolio of Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI), is empowering retailers to take the next step toward precise, data-driven retail outcomes. New people-counting devices enabled with Re-Identification (Re-ID) utilize advanced deep learning and artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities designed to provide powerful insights into shopper demographics, abandonment rates, shopper-only conversion rates, dwell tim

headline: Johnson Controls: Portfolio Transformation And Megatrends Support Re-Rating
summary: Johnson Controls trades at a premium vs. historical avg., but valuation is justified by exposure to secular growth trends and a stronger, recurring revenue mix. Learn more on JCI stock here.

headline: Data Center Cooling Market Landscape Report 2025-2030 Featuring 4energy, 3M, Asetek, Black Box, Carrier, Condair, Daikin, Delta, Johnson Controls, Mitsubishi, STULZ, Schneider, Rittal, Vertiv
summary: The global data center cooling market is poised for substantial growth, with its valuation projected to soar from USD 16.32 billion in 2024 to USD 40.72 billion by 2030, marking a CAGR of 16.46%. Fueling this expansion is the adoption of advanced technologies like AI and ML, necessitating efficient cooling to manage high-performance demand. Innovations, such as liquid cooling, are crucial in tackling the rising rack power density driven by AI, IoT, and cryptocurrency mining. Geographically, Nort
